biotools.summary: This tool is a part of the network analysis tool suite (NeAT). Given a metabolic network, the tool extracts a subnetwork that connects a list of input compounds, reactions, EC numbers or enzyme-coding genes. Three metabolic networks (KEGG LIGAND, KEGG RPAIR and MetaCyc) are preloaded, but custom networks can be submitted as well.

bioschemas.name: Pathway extraction
